collection.name: Chapman University Toyota of Orange 5K Run/Walk
collection.content: Race starts at Schmid Gate and ends in Attallah Piazza.

collection.name: Chancellor’s Coffee and Parents Ambassador Council Welcome
collection.content: Parents, join Chancellor Daniele Struppa for a cup of joe and mingle with fellow Panther parents.
collection.location: Bush Conference Center, Beckman Hall, Room 404

collection.name: Chapman Family Lunch and Lawn Games
collection.content: Enjoy a freshly cooked BBQ lunch and challenge friends to a game of life-size chess, lawn bowling and more. Join in the fun at reserved tables for alumni groups including BSU, Dodge College film and communications alumni, 50 Year Club and more.

collection.name: President’s Welcome and University Update
collection.content: Join President Doti where he will welcome the Chapman Family to campus and share updates about the latest and greatest Chapman news and happenings.

collection.name: 5th Annual Chili Cook-Off and Tailgate
collection.content: Something spicy is in the air for Chapman’s 5th annual Chili Cook-Off. Enjoy sampling unique chilis and hanging out in the beer and wine garden.

collection.name: UPB Presents: Student End Zone Party
collection.content: Students are invited to the Student End Zone Party with games, food and beverages, and plenty of fun as we get ready for the big game kick-off!

collection.name: Homecoming Game Viewing Party in the Piazza
collection.content: All members of the Chapman Family are invited to stay in Attallah Piazza after the Chili Cook-Off and Tailgate and watch the big game on live streaming TVs. The beer and wine garden will remain open and food will be available for purchase.

collection.name: Homecoming Football Game vs. Pomona-Pitzer
collection.content: This year they’ll take on SCIAC foe Pomona-Pitzer in a game that is expected to have playoff implications for the mighty Cardinal & Gray. Tickets must be purchased separately at ChapmanAthletics.com
collection.location: Wilson Field, Chapman Stadium, Lastinger Athletics Complex

collection.name: Chapman Day of Service Check-In
collection.content:
Chapman alumni, faculty, staff, families and students are invited to engage in service together on campus and at a variety of public service agencies in the Orange County community.

Student Ballroom, Argyros Forum, Room 119

collection.name: State of the Academy Address
collection.content:
Join Chancellor Daniele Struppa as he showcases Chapman's exciting academic successes and challenges over the last year and discusses its future path. Dr. Struppa will explain our progress and explore the future of Chapman University.

Chapman Auditorium, Memorial Hall

collection.name: Faculty Master Classes
collection.content: Check your schedule for times and locations.

collection.name: Schmid College Reception
collection.content:
Mix and mingle with students, parents, alumni and faculty of Schmid College.

Irvine Lecture Hall, Hashinger Science Center

collection.name: Dialogue with the Deans
collection.content: Check your schedule for times and locations.

collection.name: “A Golden State of Mind” Documentary Screening
collection.content:
Check out a screening of A Golden State of Mind: The Storytelling Genius of Huell Howser and celebrate his incredible legacy.

Chapman Auditorium, Memorial Hall

collection.name: The College of Performing Arts Presents: Hot Mikado
collection.content:
Set in a 1940s jazz club setting, Hot Mikado weaves a tale of hilarious proportions. Despite the life or death stakes, characters still find time to tap their toes and do their fair share of scatting.

﻿Waltmar Theatre

Chapman Family tickets: $5

collection.name: First Cut Screening
collection.content:
Come view the work of the storytellers of tomorrow at this screening of student films from Dodge College of Film and Media Arts.

Folino Theater, Marion Knott Studios

collection.heading: Homecoming Athletics Events
collection.content:
Men's Water Polo vs. Golden West College, 9 a.m.
Allred Pool, Allred Aquatics Center, Lastinger Athletics Complex

Women's Soccer vs. University of Redlands, 11 a.m.
Wilson Field, Chapman Stadium, Lastinger Athletics Complex

Men’s Water Polo vs. Concordia University, 4 p.m.
Allred Pool, Allred Aquatics Center, Lastinger Athletics Complex

Homecoming Football Game vs. Pomona-Pitzer Colleges, 7 p.m.
Wilson Field, Chapman Stadium, Lastinger Athletics Complex
